DOC.criteria: hyperhomocysteinemia ( tHcy > 12.5 µmol/L men 11.5 µmol/L woman ) No evident history CVD 4. evidence cigarette smoke participate clinical study evaluation cardiac disease take lipid lower treatment pregnant breast feeding baby ( woman ) Having HIV viral hepatitis infection . unstable condition transplant kidney ( Cr > 3 mg/dl , BUN > 50 mg/dl ) Cyclosporine ( CsA ) intoxication New onset severe disease ( MI , stroke , DM , etc . ) .
